What should I do if my antivirus software flags the Verus software as a virus or "not-a-virus"?

If your antivirus software flags the Verus software as a virus or "not-a-virus", it may be a false positive. This is because the software is a cryptocurrency miner, and some antivirus software may flag it as a potential threat. You can review the resources provided to learn more about these false positives and understand that they are warnings about installing mining software, not actual viruses.
